apps.title: Odin's Forecast
apps.imageURL: The results of a weather search on the 'Odin's Forecast' weather app
apps.description: A weather app built to deliver only the most important weather information. It can run in any browser, works on mobile and desktop, and uses the latest web technology for fast results.
